Zibits

An experiment invloving an alchemy of universal dynamics, Generative art and game theory. An attempt to shape the future of Gen Z Meta society via cultural, social and linguistic multiverses.

Zib One

Zibit is a collection of 5,555 PFP NFTs—unique digital collectibles living on the Ethereum blockchain. Your Zibits grants access to members-only benefits, the first of which is access to the Zib One, a collaborative Social Market Media Place. Future areas and perks can be unlocked by the community through roadmap activation.

Beyond PFP

Each Zibit is unique and programmatically generated from over 170 possible traits, including expression, headwear, clothing, and more. They are stored as ERC-721 tokens on the Ethereum blockchain and hosted on IPFS. Purchasing a zibit costs 0.05 ETH.


‍

Loyality Rewards

The chests are full of incredible rewards! Among them, you can find boosts, etherum, xp, merchandizing, cruise tickets... and who knows, if you are lucky maybe even an elixir allowing your METAPIRATES to mutate and increase its value, its in-game abilities, its stacking power

Fair Distribution

There are no bonding curves here. Buying a Zibit costs 0.05 ETH. There are no price tiers; Zib one membership costs the same for everyone.

Membership

The Maya writing system is logosyllabic, meaning its symbols can represent sounds in the form of syllables (like “ma” or “tot”), or they might represent whole concepts (like “river” or “house”). This made the language very difficult to decode

The Art

Many syllables can be represented by more than one glyph. Mayan script was usually written in paired vertical columns reading from left to right and top to bottom in a zigzag pattern.

Zibits NFTs

When you buy a Zibit, you’re not simply buying an avatar or a provably-rare piece of art. You are gaining membership access to a club whose benefits and offerings will increase over time. Your PFP can serve as your digital identity, and open digital doors for you.
